casebody.data:
NEEB SERVICE, LLC f/k/a Neeb Service, Inc.
v.
Norman S. FOSTER, Chief Financial Officer and Director of Finance of the City of New Orleans, Department of Finance, Enroll G. Williams, Assessor, Orleans Parish Assessor, Louisiana Tax Commission NO. 2018-C-0336 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 20, 2018

Denied.
